data.actual_result: The list keeps loading and you’re not able to select a member
data.expected_result: the list loads in one time and you’re able to select a user and edit them
data.short_description: [poor connection bug] Discord keeps loading users and I’m not able to touch any button. I can only close the app.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a large server (Like Discord API)- Go to Server settings - Go to Members - See the list keeps loading in users - Try every button on the screen. No one working!
